title: Sakurai-san Wants to Be Noticed Vol. 2
features: Mako still can’t figure out what’s up with Sakurai. When they’re alone together, she seems so happy, and she’s always teasing–and getting right up into his personal space! But lately, she’s blushing about it even more than he is. Could it be that she’s not just teasing? Does she really…like him?!
